title: The votes are in - dev starts March 14! (Team Jam Packed - Thunderdome XI)
body:
Hey everyone! Thousands of you voted, and three themes stood far above the rest for [**JAM PACKED**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/iGEBjVEQ-help-us-make-3-minigames-in-48-hours-team-jam-packed-thunderdome-xi), the quest to design, create and (hopefully) ship three unofficial minigames in 48 hours.

We’re excited to announce that when we start development on March 14, we’ll be making… 

https://i.imgur.com/QRTGAug.jpg

**STAR GUARDIAN, PROJECT, and POOL PARTY** themed minigames. 

So next up: the exciting (and also scary) part. You can follow our progress right now at https://instagram.com/teamjampacked and https://twitter.com/teamjampacked and we’d also love if you’d come hang out with us in our Discord server, which you can find here: https://discord.gg/jHvdTmu

Let's make some awesome games together!

- Team Jam Packed

replies.body:
No Pentakill{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

I blame the weebs.
Sad that Pentakill didn't get on there, oh well. GLHF should be some cool games :3
No Pentakill... Sad Days... Didn't really care about the other ones lol {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

How was nobody voting for DARK STAR? Well, it was obvious, that Star Guardian would be winning though.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Those were the three I wanted most, awesome!

Development Corner? hmmm, so I shouldnt be a Swain showing my lefty in lane all game, or the teammate Teemo that wonders mid lane just to drop a mushroom on my head and laugh?

Awesome games? They better make you say oh god and oh yeah when watch and play them.

Because thats what I feel makes LuL an awesome game, I often find development when given the choice to do what ever they want, tends to become lazy and then focuses on a gimick or concept as the reason to their "awesome"ness, resulting in the achivement of a different word. This often is due to trying to be "PG" in a work place environment, yet you can still achive an "oh god why" and a "oh yeah haha" reception and deliver without being sexual in any way or without it being in fact another word?

I'm going to be honest, your problem is not words, it's the controller, just make all of your games use a 2001 Jet Air Craft joy stick, and let them figure it out; it is a propper medium to bind and connect every aspect required to achive Awesome PG.

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}} Enjoy.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YKzGct28Vxw
Feature MF in the pool party or star guardian one!!
star guardian pool party and project, says so much bout lol community.
I hope Jhin is somewhere in the project one.
